results.content:
However this course consist of great content to purely understand the interoperability between Django API and Angular, it is my belief that the instructor does not provide enough time for one to perceive the few explanations that he provide.

In my option, if you have knowledge of modern programming platforms, this should be great, but for beginners... Not so great.
results.content_html:

results.content:
This course is good and is not for Beginners. Its an intermediate - advanced course. 
I learned how Apis work for Django - Angular. And know how does work at all.
Thanks a lot.
